Description: Bright and sunny 4 Bed 2 1/2 bath brick front colonial in sought-after Kings Crossing. Extra wide Brazil cherry hardwood floor through main floor. Gourmet kitchen with granite counter and island. Full of natural light open floor plan with two-story family room with fireplace large sun room off kitchen. Facing park and playground. Large 1/3 ac lot.

Description: Cul-de-sec elegant single house with NEW ROOF NEW DRIVEWAY NEW AC. 2-story open foyer fully finished basement with entertainment room full bath and spacious open space for multiple purpose use. One bed room in main floor closet can be converted to bath or use as office. Sunlight filled 4 BR and 2 Full Bath upper level deck off kitchen with stairs to ground beautiful greenery open view

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator
* Freezer

Description: This is a great opportunity to rent a 2 BR 1 BA basement apartment. Modern Kitchen appliances. Washer and Dryer in unit. ALL utilities INCLUDED!!! Private illuminated and secure entrance. Use of yard and deck. Parking on driveway. Very close to public transportation. Very easy access to major highways(270 ICC MD 200 Beltway) Small child playground 100 away.
